query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'blog_posts' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user QFvPm5Jiq2VbcdU.33b2dcb6631d --database bJpZLaNUAwiEuNvz3b7LGz --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'blog_posts' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
